entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
